text: Melanio Asensio Montes (18 May 1936 – 15 January 2021) was a Spanish sprinter. He competed in the men's 200 metres at the 1960 Summer Olympics. Asensio was born in Bimenes, Spain. Asensio died on 15 January 2021 at the age of 84.Fallece a los 84 años Melanio Asensio, el primer atleta olímpico asturiano ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish sprinters Category:Olympians for Spain
title: Melanio Asensio
